mapper.sql: id, user_id, agent_id, admin_id, wait_num, buy_money, buy_type, buy_status, check_status, check_time, pay_status, pay_time, apply_time
mapper.update:
update bussiness
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
agent_id = #{agentId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
admin_id = #{adminId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
wait_num = #{waitNum,jdbcType=INTEGER},
buy_money = #{buyMoney,jdbcType=REAL},
buy_type = #{buyType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
buy_status = #{buyStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_status = #{checkStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
check_time = #{checkTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
pay_status = #{payStatus,jdbcType=INTEGER},
pay_time = #{payTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
apply_time = #{applyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
